MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 10:43AM in the LL28 postcode area of Colwyn Bay following reports of grounded overhead lines. This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers are on their way to the area and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:52AM on 12th January 2021
